languages.text: It guides the worship of trillions of people on numberless worlds across the vast divides of the void. The core of the Ecclesiarchy's power is the Cult Imperialis, also known as the Imperial Creed. Any deviance from its strictures and theology is considered heresy and brutally suppressed.
languages.original_text: Формирует верования триллионов людей на бесчисленных мирах галактики. Основой могущества Экклезиархии является Культ Империалис, также известный как Имперское кредо. Любые радикальные отклонения от его догматов и теологии считаются ересью и жестоко пресекаются.

traits.locale_text: It guides the worship of trillions of people on numberless worlds across the vast divides of the void. The core of the Ecclesiarchy's power is the Cult Imperialis, also known as the Imperial Creed. Any deviance from its strictures and theology is considered heresy and brutally suppressed.

It guides the worship of trillions of people on numberless worlds across the vast divides of the void. The core of the Ecclesiarchy's power is the Cult Imperialis, also known as the Imperial Creed. Any deviance from its strictures and theology is considered heresy and brutally suppressed.

It guides the worship of trillions of people on numberless worlds across the vast divides of the void. The core of the Ecclesiarchy's power is the Cult Imperialis, also known as the Imperial Creed. Any deviance from its strictures and theology is considered heresy and brutally suppressed.

languages.text: Формирует верования триллионов людей на бесчисленных мирах галактики. Основой могущества Экклезиархии является Культ Империалис, также известный как Имперское кредо. Любые радикальные отклонения от его догматов и теологии считаются ересью и жестоко пресекаются.

Leitet die Anbetung von Billionen von Menschen auf zahllosen Welten in den riesigen Weiten der Leere an. Der Kern der Macht der Ekklesiarchie ist der Cult Imperialis, auch bekannt als Imperialer Glaube. Jede Abweichung von den strengen Regeln und der Theologie wird als Ketzerei betrachtet und brutal unterdrückt.
languages.original_text: It guides the worship of trillions of people on numberless worlds across the vast divides of the void. The core of the Ecclesiarchy's power is the Cult Imperialis, also known as the Imperial Creed. Any deviance from its strictures and theology is considered heresy and brutally suppressed.

traits.locale_text: Leitet die Anbetung von Billionen von Menschen auf zahllosen Welten in den riesigen Weiten der Leere an. Der Kern der Macht der Ekklesiarchie ist der Cult Imperialis, auch bekannt als das Imperiale Glaube. Jede Abweichung von den strengen Regeln und der Theologie wird als Ketzerei betrachtet und brutal unterdrückt.

languages.text: Guide la pratique religieuse de milliards d'individus sur d'innombrables mondes à travers les vastes divisions du cosmos. Le Culte Imperialis, également appelé Credo Impérial, est au cœur du pouvoir de l'Ecclésiarchie. Toute violation de ses règles et de sa théologie relève de l'hérésie et est sévèrement réprimée.
languages.original_text: It guides the worship of trillions of people on numberless worlds across the vast divides of the void. The core of the Ecclesiarchy's power is the Cult Imperialis, also known as the Imperial Creed. Any deviance from its strictures and theology is considered heresy and brutally suppressed.

traits.locale_text: Guide le culte de milliers de milliards de personnes sur d'innombrables mondes à travers les vastes divisions du vide. Le Culte Imperialis, également connu sous le nom de Credo Impérial, est au cœur du pouvoir de l'Ecclésiarchie. Toute violation de ses règles et de sa théologie relève de l'hérésie et est sévèrement réprimée.

languages.text: 帝国国教负责指引广袤宇宙无数世界数万亿臣民对帝皇的崇拜。国教权力的核心是帝国的信条，又被称为“帝国信仰”。一切偏离国教教义的行为都会被视为异端恶行，会遭到国教的残酷镇压。
languages.original_text: It guides the worship of trillions of people on numberless worlds across the vast divides of the void. The core of the Ecclesiarchy's power is the Cult Imperialis, also known as the Imperial Creed. Any deviance from its strictures and theology is considered heresy and brutally suppressed.

traits.locale_text: 帝国国教负责指引广袤宇宙无数世界数万亿臣民对帝皇的崇拜。国教权力的核心是帝国的信条，又被称为“帝国信仰”。一切偏离国教教义的行为都会被视为异端恶行，会遭到国教的残酷镇压。

languages.text: それは、虚空の広大な隔たりを越えて、無数の世界の何兆もの人々の崇拝を導いている。帝国聖教会（エクレシアーキー）の権力の中核は帝国教団であり、帝国信条集（インペリアル・クリード）としても知られている。その厳格さと神学から逸脱するものは異端とみなされ、無残に弾圧される。
languages.original_text: It guides the worship of trillions of people on numberless worlds across the vast divides of the void. The core of the Ecclesiarchy's power is the Cult Imperialis, also known as the Imperial Creed. Any deviance from its strictures and theology is considered heresy and brutally suppressed.

traits.locale_text: それは、虚空の広大な隔たりを越えて、無数の世界の何兆もの人々の崇拝を導いている。帝国聖教会（エクレシアーキー）の権力の中核は帝国教団であり、帝国信条集（インペリアル・クリード）としても知られている。その厳格さと神学から逸脱するものは異端とみなされ、無残に弾圧される。

languages.text: Controla el culto de billones de personas en un gran número de mundos a través de las vastas divisiones del vacío. El centro del poder de la Eclesiarquía es el Culto Imperial, también conocido como Credo Imperial. Cualquier desviación de sus preceptos y teología se considera herejía y es objeto de brutal opresión.
languages.original_text: It guides the worship of trillions of people on numberless worlds across the vast divides of the void. The core of the Ecclesiarchy's power is the Cult Imperialis, also known as the Imperial Creed. Any deviance from its strictures and theology is considered heresy and brutally suppressed.

traits.locale_text: Controla el culto de billones de personas en un gran número de mundos a través de las vastas divisiones del vacío. El centro del poder de la Eclesiarquía es el Culto Imperial, también conocido como Credo Imperial. Cualquier desviación de sus preceptos y teología se considera herejía y es objeto de brutal opresión.

languages.text: Uçsuzun engin bölümlerine dağılmış sayısız dünyadaki trilyonlarca insanın ibadedine rehberlik eder. Ekleşiarşi'nin gücünün merkezinde İmparatorluk İtikadı olarak da bilinen Cult İmperialis bulunur. Katı kurallarından ve teolojisinden her türlü sapma, kâfirlik olarak atfedilir ve acımasızca bastırılır.
languages.original_text: It guides the worship of trillions of people on numberless worlds across the vast divides of the void. The core of the Ecclesiarchy's power is the Cult Imperialis, also known as the Imperial Creed. Any deviance from its strictures and theology is considered heresy and brutally suppressed.
